summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General voluntary interview form used to document warnings and assurances given to an employee being asked to provide information as part of an investigation. The form includes a waiver section for the employee to sign, acknowledging the voluntary nature of the interview.
keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General.
The form is used to inform an employee that they are being asked to provide information as part of an investigation.
The interview is voluntary, and no disciplinary action will be taken if the employee chooses not to answer questions.
Any statement provided may be used as evidence in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The form includes a waiver section for the employee to sign, acknowledging the warnings and assurances.
